name: S-COPTER: Trials of Quick Fingers and Logic
description: S-COPTER is a combination of an arcade game, a platformer and a bit of a puzzle game, viewed from a 2D perspective. The playerâ€™s goal is to transport all the passengers on a level to their respective landing sites.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800GTX with 512MB of memory or equivalent Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any card with 2GB of memory should be sufficient Storage: 2 GB available space
